title: Learning that is not demonstrated at the time i...

content.question: Burat enters a cooking competition that requires him to use ingredients and cooking tools that he has never used before. He is able to develop and cook a meal that the judges find tasty. Burat is demonstrating which of the following types of learning, which is the kind that is not demonstrated until the time it is needed?

topic.text: 3.9: Social, Cognitive, and Neurological Factors in Learning

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
